## Abstract

Have you ever found yourself with a big pile of messy code? (I know the answer is yes, there's no shame in that).

You know you need to clean it up but you just don't know where to start.

I recently helped a client completely refactor her R package. This short talk will give you actionable tips to help you refactor your code and make it easier for collaborators to work with it.
